consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.lead: When you step into the new and start drifting — I help you see reality, regain your line, and turn it into steps.
what: I want to do X, never did it — where do I start?
My creative work feels bland — how do I bring it to life?
A team started strong and got stuck — how do we regain momentum?
I’m “the leader” but I’m running after everyone — how do I fix it?
I feel unfree even alone — how do I become freer?

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.lead: 1:1 sessions: see reality, regain your line, build a plan. $100–$150 per session, no hard time limit.
consulting.whyLead: When it’s noisy inside, it’s easy to miss. We’ll make it quieter and sharper.
whyPoints: You step into the new and lose the spark.
You lead, but you carry everything and start falling apart.
A team got stuck and stopped moving.
consulting.howLead: A simple funnel: context → clarity → plan → motion.
topics: Production and moving to a goal in chaos
consulting.finalBody: Write 3 lines: 1) what you’re doing 2) where you’re stuck 3) what outcome you want.
